snippet.title: Prodeus - Release Date Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/prodeus/

Prodeus 1.0 is launching on September 23 on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5!

ABOUT PRODEUS
Prodeus is a first-person shooter of old, re-imagined using modern rendering techniques and technology. Experience the quality you’d expect from a modern AAA game, designed with retro aesthetics and gameplay that invoke the tech-imposed limits of older hardware.

The game features a hand-crafted campaign from industry FPS veterans, co-op and competitive multiplayer play drawing on classic modes, and a built-in community map browser for instantaneous action with nearly limitless levels to play.

Get ready to paint the walls red. This is the Boomer Shooter you’ve been waiting for.

Rated Mature

#ps5games #ps4games
